content: I'm also not entirely sure what protocols/workflows need to be set up now for the infinity-cosmos repository. Suggestions are also very welcome.

It seems the blueprint workflows are working very well! https://emilyriehl.github.io/infinity-cosmos/blueprint/dep_graph_document.html
I recommend linking to the blueprint from the repository README.
Is there a way to have CONTRIBUTING.md update automatically? Or is the idea that this should be done manually while the github contributors list is the automatic one?
I think Floris is just suggesting to add a link to the blueprint in the README for the repo.
I have added clickable badges in the README https://github.com/emilyriehl/infinity-cosmos/
